title: The Poisoned Protocol
subtitle: When Trust Becomes the Vector
blurb: When trusted supply lines become vectors of corruption, the Kingdom faces a threat that weaponizes trust itself. A tale of software supply chain attacks and the impossible choice between isolation and connection.
lorekeeperNote: The most dangerous corruption does not break down walls—it walks through open gates, wearing the face of a friend. I have seen this pattern before, and I fear I shall see it again.

title: The Breach at Merchant's Gate
subtitle: A Tale of Credential Compromise
blurb: A routine security assessment reveals how a single compromised credential can cascade through interconnected systems. The Secret Council must balance commerce and security as darkness spreads through the trade networks.
lorekeeperNote: A single key, carelessly kept, can open more doors than its holder ever imagined. The merchants learned this lesson at great cost.

title: The Choice Between Walls
subtitle: When the only way to save trust was to erase it
blurb: The Unraveler doesn't breach systems—it unravels the trust that holds them together. When subtle inconsistencies begin spreading through the Kingdom's records, Queen Lyra faces three impossible choices: quarantine and cripple the Kingdom, hunt openly and accelerate the doubt, or use the forbidden Forgetting Protocol to reset everyone's memory and hunt the entity in secret.

title: The Price of Certainty
subtitle: Part 1: The Ledger Crisis
blurb: Transaction records are destroying themselves. Merchant-Lord Cassia has hours before merchants lose trust in the entire economic system. The Secret Council must choose: shutdown, chaos, or a 70% gamble.
lorekeeperNote: When the ledgers lie, commerce dies. Not from theft, but from doubt.

title: The Price of Certainty
subtitle: Part 2: The Three-Day Gamble
blurb: The honeypot is active. The entity learns in the decoy sector while merchants operate on manual ledgers. Cassia must hold the economy together for three days—barely sleeping, carrying secrets, gambling everything.
lorekeeperNote: Three days. Seventy percent odds. The weight of an economy on one merchant's shoulders.

title: The Price of Certainty
subtitle: Part 3: The Weight of Leadership
blurb: Victory brings reflection. The entity fled, the systems are restored, but Cassia must reckon with what leadership truly costs—and whether she's prepared to keep paying it.
lorekeeperNote: The weight never lifts. But purpose makes it bearable.

title: The Price of Certainty
subtitle: A Cassia Story
blurb: When an entity begins corrupting transaction records across the Kingdom, Merchant-Lord Cassia faces an impossible choice. Three days. Seventy percent odds. An economy held together by manual ledgers and trust. A tale of data integrity attacks and the weight of leadership.
lorekeeperNote: When the ledgers lie, commerce dies. Not from theft, but from doubt. Cassia learned what every leader must: that certainty is a luxury, and the price of protecting it is paid in sleepless nights and impossible choices.

title: The Wall That Held
subtitle: An Origin Story
blurb: Before he was High Commander, Valdris was a young Warden at a forgotten outpost. This is the night that forged him.

title: The Shadow's Price
subtitle: A Shade Story
blurb: Every piece of intelligence has a cost. When Shade's network is compromised, he must decide what he's willing to sacrifice to protect the Kingdom.

title: The Harvest Festival Incident
subtitle: When Warnings Go Unheeded
blurb: Cassia's greatest failure—and greatest lesson. The story of how ignoring security warnings during the busiest trading season nearly cost the Kingdom everything.

title: The First Waking
subtitle: How the Tower Came to Dream
blurb: A thousand years ago, the Tower was just stone. This is the story of how it awakened, and how the first Lorekeeper was chosen.
